title: Kill Kagha
content:

TO AVOID WAR BUT STILL KILL KAGHA: Combat can be initiated through dialogue options granted by the subquest Investigate Kagha, which will have most of the Druids turn against Kagha and the Shadow Druids and aid you in combat. The Druids will not turn against the Tieflings, saving all NPCs outside the Emerald Grove chamber from potentially dying.
